categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Gorik was a Human male colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War. Stationed on Tatooine around 3643 BBY, he at one point requested an audience with Moff Merile Yurrion. Gorik employed Havoc Squad defector Vanto Bazren and a Geonosian named Kyvax to build bomb-filled droids to be tested in the city of Anchorhead. When the reformed Havoc Squad showed up to take him down, Gorik managed to escape.
